creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: ink drawing on thin paper with touches of red; drawings on recto and verso--difficult to read each side due to thinness of paper; half of man's face with a rectangular element covering other half of face; portion of foreshortened grimacing face with short hair, with cloud-like elements covering top of head
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Types Selected by Yoshitoshi (Kaidai hyakusen sō 魁題百撰相)
title: Preparatory drawing of Sakuma Dennai
